channel.title: Comments for page "Great Expectations"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Great Expectations"

item.title: Hang-out
item.content:encoded: Does anyone know what happens if you hang-out with both Lil' Whitey and Stalkergirl on the hang-out requirement? I'd assume you fail, but maybe there's something there? Actually on second thought, McM wouldn't put anything in a place you can't get back to like that. But maybe hang-out with both afterward?
